means: 扎伊尔（非洲扎伊尔货币名称）

sentence.Network_en: In Zaire political change was on its way.
sentence.Network_cn: 在扎伊尔，政治变革正在推进。

sentence.Network_en: Zaire's national conference on democracy ended ambiguously.
sentence.Network_cn: 扎伊尔关于民主的全国大会结束了，但未有结果。

sentence.Network_en: They shouted him down when he tried to explain why Zaire needed an interim government.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他试图解释为什么扎伊尔需要一个过渡政府时，他们大声叫嚷着把他的声音盖过去了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2010年6月23日 - 二十世纪曾一度改称“扎伊尔(Zaire)”。  国旗长与宽之比为4:3,底色为天蓝色,代表和平;对角线有一条红色带,代表烈士的鲜血;红色带旁边有两道.

list.abs: 世界航空公司代码... ... 突尼斯尼韦尔航空公司 Nouvelair Tunisie 扎伊尔航空公司 Air Zaire 扎伊尔快运公司 Zaire Express.
ISO国家代码表 - againinput的日志 - 网易博客 ... 扎伊尔 Zaire 扎伊尔共和国 Republic of Zaire 津巴布韦 Zimbabwe.
**注3：今日萨伊共和国(Republic of Zaire)已不存在，于1997年更名为刚果民主共和国(DRC，Democratic Republic of the Congo)， …

derivation.yuyuan_name: from Zaire, a local name for the Congo River in central Africa

means.word_mean: 1. the basic unit of money in Zaire

auth_sentence.content: But he also made Zaire synonymous with corruption.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he also made Zaire synonymous with corruption.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he also made Zaire synonymous with corruption.

auth_sentence.content: Some two million Hutus fled to Zaire, now the DR Congo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some two million Hutus fled to Zaire, now the DR Congo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some two million Hutus fled to Zaire, now the DR Congo.

auth_sentence.content: Like Zaire's Mobutu Sese Seko, he wears a leopard-skin hat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Like Zaire's Mobutu Sese Seko, he wears a leopard-skin hat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Like Zaire's Mobutu Sese Seko, he wears a leopard-skin hat.

Sentence.sentence: By eating food grown in Sudan and Zaire.
